org.codehaus.mojo.servicedocgen

Class Analyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.mojo.servicedocgen.Analyzer

  • public class Analyzer
extends Object
    Analyzer contains the logic to analyze the services on byte-code and source-code level and create the according Descriptors.
    Author:
    hohwille
    See Also:
    createServicesDescriptor(List)

      • Analyzer

        public Analyzer(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project,
                ClassLoader projectClassloader,
                com.thoughtworks.qdox.JavaProjectBuilder builder,
                ServicesDescriptor descriptor,
                boolean introspectFields)
        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        log - the Log.
        project - the MavenProject. May be null for testing.
        projectClassloader - the ClassLoader to load byte-code.
        builder - the JavaProjectBuilder.
        descriptor - the pre-configured ServicesDescriptor template.
        introspectFields - true to introspect beans using fields, false for getters.
